title: Tadej Pogačar’s New Colnago Y1Rs Has Rainbow Stripes & 3D Printed Details
content:
We’ve already seen it raced but Pogačar’s Colnago Y1Rs has the sacred rainbow stripes and a 3D printed Wahoo mount.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar’s New Colnago Y1Rs Has Rainbow Stripes & 3D Printed Details on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
